name: Abide the Loop
description:
Abide the Loop is a rhythm game where the goal is simply click/press at the right time to match the rhythm. The higher % accuracy of your rhythm the higher score you will get, but if you miss you have to start all over!

This game was made in <48hrs for the Ludum Dare compo(theme 'Stuck in a loop').

View the games Ludum Dare page.

 Download source code(MIT license). 

I programmed and developed this game live on Twitch, you can watch the development streams here:

Dev Stream #1
